name: adc_ltm_pool_list
scriptContent:
from appviewx import db_connection
connect_db = db_connection()

def getLTMPoolList():
    '''
    To get the LTM pool list

    '''

    ltm_pool_list = []
    db_filter = {'code': 'lp'}
    adc_ltm_pool_list = connect_db.appviewx.ro.find(db_filter)
    for device in adc_ltm_pool_list:
        ltm_pool_list.append(device)
    return ltm_pool_list
description: To get a list of LTM pool
_keywords: To get a list of LTM pool
